bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR PRICE EVALUATION OF ARTICLES OF COMMERCE

abstract.p: The invention is directed to systems and methods for indicating volatility adjusted price information for at least one article of commerce or market therefore, and various tools for providing valuation indicators for both current and historical price activity in terms of valuation rather than absolute price. The invention provides users indicators which quantify the degree in which a market is currently trading at fair value, overvalued or undervalued conditions using enhanced tools.

nplcit.text: - Computer printout of http://www.bollingerbands.com/bbands.asp Title, "Bollinger Bands Tutorial #1"
- J. Peter Steidlmayer, "Steidlmayer on Markets a New Approach to Trading," John Wiley & Sons, Inc., (May 24, 1989)
"Reuters and John Bollinger's Acme Analytics Corp. Announce Content Agreement; Bollinger Stock Performance Charts to be Offered on Reuters Investor". PR Newswire. New York: Sep. 28, 1999. p. 1
"Introducing IQ Chart, Professional-Quality Stock Analysis Software for the Internet Investor Business Editors" Business Wire. New York: Aug. 4, 1998. p. 1
Santoli, Michael. "The striking price: About that chart below". Barron's. New York, N.Y.: Feb. 7, 2000. vol. 80, Iss. 6; p. MW10 (1 page)

abstract.p: The invention is directed to a market price charting method for displaying both current and historical price activity in terms of valuation rather than absolute price. The invention allows users to quantify the degree in which a market is overbought or oversold. Results may be displayed electronically or on a hard copy for viewing or used in additional analysis of a market.

Results may be displayed electronically or on a hard copy for viewing or used in additional analysis of a market.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEME ET TECHNIQUE D'ELABORATION DE GRAPHIQUES DE COURS

abstract.p: A system and method is disclosed for receiving, processing and displaying a collection of financial asset price data for analysis and making of a trading decision by an investor. The system includes a programmable computer having a central processing unit (CPU)
a communication device linked to said computer
a display connected to said computer

and a software program for providing a set of instructions to said computer on how to receive and process said collection of price data and how to exhibit a plurality of price charts on said display. The method comprises the steps of receiving a collection of financial asset price data from an external data source through said communication device
inputting said received collection of asset price data to said computer
processing said collection of asset price data in said central processing unit
and showing on said display a plurality of enhanced price charts derived from said processing step.

L'invention concerne un système et un procédé destinés à recevoir, à traiter et à afficher un ensemble de données relatives au cours de biens financiers, permettant à un investisseur d'effectuer une analyse et de prendre une décision commerciale. Le système comporte un ordinateur programmable doté d'une unité centrale de traitement (UC), d'un dispositif de communication relié à l'ordinateur, d'un écran d'affichage relié à l'ordinateur, et d'un logiciel destiné à fournir à ce même ordinateur un ensemble d'instructions sur la manière de recevoir et de traiter cet ensemble de données relatives aux cours et sur la manière d'afficher plusieurs graphiques des cours sur l'écran d'affichage.

Le procédé consiste à recevoir un ensemble de données relatives au cours de biens financiers à partir d'une source de données extérieure par ledit dispositif de communication, à introduire dans l'ordinateur cet ensemble de données relatives au cours des biens, à traiter les données dans l'unité centrale de traitement, et à afficher sur l'écran plusieurs graphiques améliorés des cours, dérivés de l'étape de traitement.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEME ET TECHNIQUE D'ELABORATION DE GRAPHIQUES DE COURS
